price: außer Iblis; er weigerte sich, mit denen zu sein, die sich niederwerfen.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
